title: Venezuela Accuses US of Attack as Explosions Rock Caracas
description: Venezuela accused the US of launching an attack on the country after explosions rocked Caracas, the capital, and aircraft were seen flying overhead, following weeks of pressure from the Trump administration against the regime of Nicolas Maduro.
content: Venezuela accused the US of launching an attack on the country after explosions rocked Caracas, the capital, and aircraft were seen flying overhead, following weeks of pressure from the Trump administration against the regime of Nicolas Maduro.
